name: svelte-axum-project
description: svelte front end with axum backend template
author: Andrei Bozantan

scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run db:drop
scripts.cargo:install: cargo install sqlx-cli && cargo install cargo-watch
scripts.db:migrate: cargo sqlx migrate run --database-url sqlite:back_end/db.sqlite --source back_end/migrations
scripts.db:init: npm run cargo:install && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:sqlx
scripts.build:backend: npm run db:init && cd back_end && cargo build --release
scripts.build:frontend: cd front_end && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.dev:init: npm install && npm run build:frontend && npm run db:init && npm run dev:init:admin
scripts.dev:init:admin: cd back_end && cargo run -- migrate create-admin --username admin --email admin@localhost
scripts.dev:backend: cd back_end && cargo watch --ignore db.sqlite --watch src --exec run
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd front_end && npm run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names fr,bk,op --prefix-colors magenta,blue,green npm:dev:frontend npm:dev:backend npm:dev:open
